sourcesContent:
import {
  SegmentA,
  SegmentB,
  SegmentC,
  SegmentD,
  SegmentE,
  SegmentF,
  SegmentG,
  Display,
} from './styles'
import { Context } from '../../context/Context'
import { useContext } from 'react'

function SegmentsDisplay(mapNumber) {
  const context = useContext(Context)

  return (
    <Display className="Display">
      <SegmentA
        color={mapNumber && mapNumber.props[0][0] === 1 ? 'black' : '#DDDDDD'}
      >
        A
      </SegmentA>
      <SegmentB className="B">B</SegmentB>
      <SegmentC className="C">C</SegmentC>
      <SegmentD className="D">D</SegmentD>
      <SegmentE className="E">E</SegmentE>
      <SegmentF className="F">F</SegmentF>
      <SegmentG SegmentG="G">G</SegmentG>
    </Display>
  )
}

export default SegmentsDisplay
